scripts.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max_old_space_size=4096" next dev
scripts.dev:custom: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max_old_space_size=4096 --no-warnings" next dev -p 3009
scripts.dev:safe: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 next dev -p 3010
scripts.dev:learn: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max_old_space_size=4096" NEXT_TELEMETRY_DISABLED=1 NODE_ENV=development next dev -p 3012
scripts.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS="--max_old_space_size=4096" next build
